nodes.text: The Tourani system was a star system that was located within the Yucrales sector, a part of the galactic regions known as the Mid Rim and the Slice. It was the origin point of the items known as Touranian jumping-stones.
The Tourani system was first mentioned in the 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas, written by Jason Fry and Daniel Wallace, which placed the system in grid square R-15.
